ridgeResidence.title: Ridge Residence Renewal
ridgeResidence.description: A mountainside home stripped back to its bones and reimagined as a warm alpine retreat.

story.before: Fragmented additions and outdated finishes muted the mountain views and natural light.
story.process: We opened the structure with engineered glulam beams, wrapped cores in walnut, and choreographed lighting with the terrain.
story.after: An open sanctuary framed in glass and timber, inviting the landscape into every gathering space.

cortezLoft.title: Cortez Creative Loft
cortezLoft.description: Industrial shell transformed into a creative headquarters with adaptable zones for work and hospitality.

story.before: Raw concrete and exposed utilities made the volume feel cold and unfinished.
story.process: Custom steel fins defined collaborative neighborhoods while warm microcement anchored circulation.
story.after: A luminous loft balancing productivity and pause, tuned for gallery nights and client residencies.

harborHouse.title: Harbor House Revival
harborHouse.description: Historical waterfront property renewed with marine-grade materials and a serene palette.

story.before: Salt exposure compromised the facade and moisture crept into interior hardwoods.
story.process: We reconstructed the envelope, integrated triple-sealed glazing, and layered mineral paints to breathe.
story.after: A coastal haven gleaming with resilience—soft neutrals, seamless transitions, and curated shoreline views.

solsticeSpa.title: Solstice Garden Spa
solsticeSpa.description: An indoor-outdoor wellness pavilion celebrating light, water, and handcrafted textures.

story.before: Underutilized courtyard lacked intimacy and year-round usability.
story.process: Sculpted terraced platforms, engineered glass canopies, and choreographed sensory lighting.
story.after: A restorative spa envelope where water, heat, and botanicals compose a daily ritual of calm.
